name: Infinity Maze (T3V)
description:
This is a short and still unfinished game. The game idea came to us while participating in the "Floppy Disk Game Jam".

You have to try to get out of the maze and not get lost in the depths of your office.


Because of a lack of time we are not able to provide a Windows version. Therefor there is only a Linux version that requires GLEW, OpenAL, SDL2 and SDL2_ttf.

The game is played by using WASD and the mouse for movement with left click for opening doors.



The game for the game jam was developed by T3V and AngeTheGreat in C++.
